response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Given its high value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth to you is $120, I propose we strike a deal at $100. This way, you get a great bargain on a product you truly value, and I ensure a fair return for my effort and resources invested into creating this product. Let me know if this offer suits you, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 100}
